channel.title: analyst.rizrazak.com — Investigative Dossiers
channel.description: Independent investigative journalism on Sri Lankan politics, cricket corruption, institutional accountability, and systemic analysis. Making complex topics digestible without losing depth.

item.title: The Death of Sri Lankan Cricket: Politics, Mafia & The Road to Ruin
item.dc:creator: Riz Razak
item.description: A comprehensive investigation into the systematic corruption, political interference, and criminal networks that have hollowed out Sri Lanka Cricket — from match-fixing syndicates to the weaponisation of selection committees.

item.title: The STBet-1xBet Betting Web: How Illegal Gambling Networks Infiltrated Sri Lankan Cricket
item.dc:creator: Riz Razak
item.description: Mapping the connections between international betting syndicates (STBet, 1xBet) and Sri Lankan cricket — player sponsorships, match manipulation, and the regulatory failures that enabled it.

item.title: The Kalathma Scandal: When Cricket's Elite Silenced a Teenager
item.dc:creator: Riz Razak
item.description: How Sri Lankan cricket's establishment used legal threats against a teenager who exposed misconduct — a case study in institutional power protecting itself.

item.title: Easter Sunday Attacks: The Suresh Sallay Connection
item.dc:creator: Riz Razak
item.description: Investigating the intelligence failures, political connections, and unanswered questions surrounding the 2019 Easter Sunday bombings in Sri Lanka — with focus on the role of intelligence chief Suresh Sallay.
